abstract.shortdesc: In this lesson, you will learn how to gather the required supplies and ingredients for your PB&J meal.

taskbody.context: Without proper tools and ingredients, your PB&J sandwich might fall flat.

task.title: Making a list of supplies and ingredients

taskbody.context: Before you begin gathering supplies, make a list to make sure you don't miss something.
